value.title: StarCraft 2: Dark's SWARM HOSTS vs Maru?!
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Maru and Dark. Maru has been playing a turtle style of Terran versus Zerg lately, and because of that Dark decides to give the most underused Zerg unit a try: The Swarm Host.
